channel.title: System on Superdanby
channel.description: Recent content in System on Superdanby

item.title: Enabling Intel Speed Shift(SST) on XPS 9550
item.description: Download Customized grub https://www.firewolf.science/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/EFI-shell.zip Configurations in BIOS Disable Secure Boot. Boot from the downloaded grub file Check the value of 0xD8: setup_var 0xD8 If the value is 0x01 SST is on already. Otherwise the value should be 0x0 in default. Enable SST: setup_var 0xD8 0x01. Make sure the value is changed, then reboot. Re-enable Secure Boot. Poof! You’re all set. Caution XPS 15 9560 is not suitable for this guide!

item.title: XPS 15 9550 Issues with Fedora 25
item.description:
Firewalld fails to stop when shutting down. Current Workaround Set CleanupOnExit=no in /etc/firewalld/firewalld.conf
Bluetooth not seeing any devices. Current Workaround sudo dnf install linux-firmware https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Firmware
